mutants.original_line: p += [n // x for x in reversed(p)]
mutants.mutated_line: p -= [n // x for x in reversed(p)]

mutants.original_line: p += [n // x for x in reversed(p)]
mutants.mutated_line: p += [n / x for x in reversed(p)]

mutants.original_line: p += [n // x for x in reversed(p)]
mutants.mutated_line: p += [n * x for x in reversed(p)]
